meanings.definition: A young hen, less than one year old.
meanings.sent1: The farmer raised pullets to eventually lay eggs.
meanings.sent2: The pullets in the coop were chirping happily.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to chase the pullets around the yard.
meanings.sent4: The pullets pecked at the ground like tiny feathered explorers.
meanings.sent5: The fluffy pullets followed their mother hen closely, learning the ways of the farm.

meanings.definition: The flesh of a young hen, used as food.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared a delicious dish using pullets as the main ingredient.
meanings.sent2: The market sold fresh pullets for roasting.
meanings.sent3: The family enjoyed a hearty meal of roasted pullets for dinner.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of cooking pullets filled the kitchen with warmth.
meanings.sent5: The tender pullets melted in your mouth, leaving a savory taste behind.
